Button

Buttons help people initiate actions, from sending an email, to sharing a document, to liking a post.

Button Colors

Dolmen supports a small number color variants out of the box, although this can be extended with custom styles.

Primary buttons are intended for calls to action. There should only be one primary button within any page section or modal dialog.

Danger buttons are used to warn the user that the action is irreversible and may have serious consequences.

<>
  <Button>Default</Button>
  <Button color="primary">Primary</Button>
  <Button color="danger">Danger</Button>
  <Button color="subtle">Subtle</Button>
</>

Button Icon Colors

Icons can be used as children of a Button component. The CSS variable --icon-color is set to the icon color corresponding to the button's color scheme and theme. If you are using SVG icons, you can add fill="var(--icon-color)" to your SVG elements, and they will automtically pick up the icon color from the button.

<>
  <Button>Default</Button>
  <Button color="primary">Primary</Button>
  <Button color="danger">Danger</Button>
  <Button color="subtle">Subtle</Button>
</>

Button Sizes

<>
  <Button size="xl">size="xl"</Button>
  <Button size="lg">size="lg"</Button>
  <Button size="md">size="md"</Button>
  <Button size="sm">size="sm"</Button>
  <Button size="xs">size="xs"</Button>
  <Button size="xxs">size="xxs"</Button>
  <Button size="xxxs">size="xxxs"</Button>
</>

Button Variants

<>
  <Button>Normal</Button>
  <Button round>Round</Button>
  <Button icon>icon</Button>
  <Button icon round>r/i</Button>
</>

Button States

<>
  <Button>Normal</Button>
  <Button disabled>disabled</Button>
  <Button selected>selected</Button>
</>

Button properties

NameDescriptionType
color Button color scheme
  • default
  • primary
  • danger
  • subtle
size Button size
  • xl
  • lg
  • md
  • sm
  • xl
  • xs
  • xxs
  • xxxs
selected

Whether the button should be rendered in a selected or "toggled" state.

boolean

round

If true, render the button as a circle or pill shape.

boolean

icon

If true, removes the button padding and ensures the width is the same as the height.

boolean

In addition, the Button element accepts all of the standard attributes of the HTML <button> element.
